mapper.select: select * from Events where Status != 'Completed' order by EventStartDate desc

select * from Events
AND eventName like CONCAT('%',#{eventName},'%') AND location like CONCAT('%',#{location},'%')
order by EventStartDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into Events(EventID, EventName, EventDescription, EventStartDate, EventEndDate, Location, Status, CreatedAt, UpdatedAt) VALUES (#{eventId}, #{eventName}, #{eventDescription}, #{eventStartDate}, #{eventEndDate}, #{location}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
